about_the_game:
HD Wallpaper Collection for Yokai's Secret
Meet your Yokai-girls again on desktop and mobile device!

Features

  • 10 well-designed themes of different Yokai-girls❤
  • HD resolutions(2436*1125, 1080*1920, 4K)❤
  • Download for free❤

Access

After download, you'll find the images in your game's directory folder, accessible through: Yokai's Secret->Properties->Browse Local Files

Thanks for your support! We will continue to offer more and better contents!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some naked contents, All characters are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
HD Wallpaper Collection for Yokai's Secret
Meet your Yokai-girls again on desktop and mobile device!

Features

  • 10 well-designed themes of different Yokai-girls❤
  • HD resolutions(2436*1125, 1080*1920, 4K)❤
  • Download for free❤

Access

After download, you'll find the images in your game's directory folder, accessible through: Yokai's Secret->Properties->Browse Local Files

Thanks for your support! We will continue to offer more and better contents!
legal_notice: All characters in this game are over 18 years old. The story is fictitious, please do not imitate the player in the real world.
